docs.snippet: Led by Carlos Carvalho, who formerly played with the Penarol Club of Uruguay and the Barcelona eleven of Spain, Brazil's champion Botafogo soccer team will be seen in its only game in this country today. The visitor will oppose a team picked from...
docs.lead_paragraph: Led by Carlos Carvalho, who formerly played with the Penarol Club of Uruguay and the Barcelona eleven of Spain, Brazil's champion Botafogo soccer team will be seen in its only game in this country today. The visitor will oppose a team picked from local American League clubs, at Randalls Island.

headline.main: BRAZILIAN ELEVEN PLAYS HERE TODAY; Champion Botafogo Team Will Face Local Soccer Stars at Randalls Island

docs.snippet: The American Jewish Congress, meeting yesterday afternoon at the Hotel Edison, announced the opening of a research institute in New York with the two-fold task of dealing with war conditions affecting Jews, and proposals to settle Jewish questions at...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American Jewish Congress, meeting yesterday afternoon at the Hotel Edison, announced the opening of a research institute in New York with the two-fold task of dealing with war conditions affecting Jews, and proposals to settle Jewish questions at any forthcoming peace conference.
docs.abstract: opening of Amer Jewish and World Jewish Congs research inst announced, N Y C

headline.main: RESEARCH IS PLANNED ON JEWISH PROBLEMS; Institute Formed to Prepare for Questions After War

docs.snippet: Edwin C. Wilson, United States Minister to Uruguay, who has been appointed Ambassador to Panama, returned yesterday aboard the American Republics liner Brazil to report to the State Department at Washington. Mr. Wilson, who has been in the South...
docs.lead_paragraph: Edwin C. Wilson, United States Minister to Uruguay, who has been appointed Ambassador to Panama, returned yesterday aboard the American Republics liner Brazil to report to the State Department at Washington. Mr. Wilson, who has been in the South American republic for a year and a half, will be succeeded by William Dawson, Ambassador to Panama.

headline.main: ENVOY HERE TO REPORT TO STATE DEPARTMENT

docs.snippet: War grows more and more mechanized, but the fighters depend more than ever on the primitive bounty of Mother Earth. In fact, a good many people hold that the chief cause of modern wars is to be found in raw materials. To move their tanks and U-boats...
docs.lead_paragraph: War grows more and more mechanized, but the fighters depend more than ever on the primitive bounty of Mother Earth. In fact, a good many people hold that the chief cause of modern wars is to be found in raw materials. To move their tanks and U-boats and airplanes the nations need petroleum.

docs.snippet: Strauss: Ein Heldenleben. Cleveland Orchestra conducted by Artur Rodzinski. (Columbia, five twelve-inch records, $5.50). Mr. Rodzinski has the temperament for and an appreciation of the brash quality required for this score. He and his orchestra do...
docs.lead_paragraph: Strauss: Ein Heldenleben. Cleveland Orchestra conducted by Artur Rodzinski. (Columbia, five twelve-inch records, $5.50). Mr. Rodzinski has the temperament for and an appreciation of the brash quality required for this score. He and his orchestra do their best to make it persuasive.
